overview: High-school principal Dr. Alfred Carroll relates to an audience of parents that marijuana can have devastating effects on teens: a drug supplier entices several restless teens, Mary and Jimmy Lane, sister and brother, and Bill, Mary's boyfriend, into frequenting a reefer house. Gradually, Bill and Jimmy are drawn into smoking dope, which affects their family lives.
tagline: Public enemy no. 1. Women cry for it… Men will die for it!
cast: Dorothy Short|Kenneth Craig|Lillian Miles|Dave O'Brien|Thelma White
